properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:13AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7
miles south of Ava, or 8 miles west of Murphysboro, moving southeast
at 20 mph.

HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around
unsecured objects.

Locations impacted include...
Carbondale, Murphysboro, Cedar Lake Area, and Gorham.
properties.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

NWSheadline: A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY THROUGH 300 AM CDT

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Jackson (ILZ084) IL
